title: The Politics of Coffee

The campaign to get Starbucks to buy more fair-trade coffee remains, in fact, ongoing. More information is available at www.globalexchange.org/campaigns/fairtrade/coffee/starbucks.html. 11. The system works like this: Internationally recognized groups inspect farms to make sure they conform to fair-trade guidelines. When they do, they gain certification that the beans grown there are fairly grown. They pay a fee for the services of the certifier
